list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: repeat or copy out (a group of words from a text or speech), typically with an indication that one is not the original author or speaker.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he quoted a passage from the Psalms
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ta trích dẫn một đoạn từ các thánh vịnh

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: give someone (the estimated price of a job or service).
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the agent quoted him a fare of $180
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Đại lý đã trích dẫn cho anh ta một giá vé $ 180

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: give (a company) a quotation or listing on a stock exchange.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: an organization that is quoted on the Stock Exchange
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: một tổ chức được trích dẫn trên thị trường chứng khoán

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a quotation from a text or speech.
a quotation giving the estimated cost for a particular job or service.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: trích dẫn từ các công ty bảo hiểm khác nhau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a price offered by a broker for the sale or purchase of a stock or other security.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: quotes for North Sea Brent were rising
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Báo giá cho North Sea Brent đang tăng lên
